## Header 1

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
```

## Importing raw data

```{r}
user_1_info_file <- here("data-raw/mmash/user_1/user_info.csv")
user_1_info_data <- read_csv(
  user_1_info_file,
  col_select = -1,
  col_types = cols(
    col_skip(),
    gender = col_character(),
    weight = col_double(),
    height = col_double(),
    age = col_double(),
    .delim = ","
  ),
  name_repair = snakecase::to_snake_case
)
```
